Uses of Interface
cardsMechanics.Card

    • Uses of Card in cardsMechanics

      Classes in cardsMechanics that implement Card 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCard
      the abstract class of the implementation of the Card interface, it compiles various methods common of the specific card types.
      class  Assassin
      A class that represent the Assassin type of card.
      class  Druid
      A class that represent the Druid type of card.
      class  Healer
      A class that represent the Healer type of card.
      class  Hunter
      A class that represent the Hunter type of card.
      class  Knight
      A class that represent the Knight type of card.
      class  Mage
      A class that represent the Mage type of card.
      class  Paladin
      A class that represent the Paladin type of card.
      class  Shaman
      A class that represent the Shaman type of card.
      class  Warlock
      A class that represent the Warlock type of card.
      Methods in cardsMechanics with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractCard.actOn(Card card) 
      void Card.actOn(Card card)
      Makes this card interact on the card passed as parameter.
      void Druid.actOnMe(Card card) 
      void Knight.actOnMe(Card card) 
      void Shaman.actOnMe(Card card) 
      void Warlock.actOnMe(Card card) 
      void Mage.actOnMe(Card card) 
      void Assassin.actOnMe(Card card) 
      void Paladin.actOnMe(Card card) 
      void Card.actOnMe(Card card)
      makes this card be the object on which the card passed as parameter interact.
      void Healer.actOnMe(Card card) 
      void Hunter.actOnMe(Card card) 
      void AbstractCard.attackOn(Card card, double Effectiveness)
      makes the damage counter of the parameter card go up in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be added to the damage counter is done by calling the damageBy method damagedBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.
      void Druid.defaultAction(Card card) 
      void Shaman.defaultAction(Card card) 
      void AbstractCard.defaultAction(Card card)
      Set the default action of this card made over the parameter card.
      void Paladin.defaultAction(Card card) 
      void Healer.defaultAction(Card card) 
      void AbstractCard.depowerOn(Card card, double Effectiveness)
      makes the attack points of the parameter card go down in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be rested to the attack points is done by calling the depoweredBy method depoweredBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.
      void AbstractCard.empowerOn(Card card, double Effectiveness)
      makes the attack points of the parameter card go up in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be added to the attack points is done by calling the empoweredBy method empoweredBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.
      void AbstractCard.healOn(Card card, double Effectiveness)
      makes the damage counter of the parameter card go down in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be rested to the damage counter is done by calling the healedBy method healedBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.
